mkiol/dsnote

offline note-taking app with speech to text, text to speech, and translation

Related repos

  • Local note-taking app that stores all notes in a single text file
  • offline speech-to-text app for desktop
  • AI voice transcription and note-taking app with privacy focus

  • Transcribes voice notes into summaries and action items
